Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the applicant's inclusion of a fraudulent IELTS document constituted a material misrepresentation under section 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Submission of a document designed to mislead immigration authorities
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Document was fraudulent and intended to induce error in application process
Crimes.Regulation_Cited: Section 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Application_Error: Inclusion of fraudulent test result without applicantâ€™s knowledge
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of finding of material misrepresentation
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Fraudulent document submitted by unauthorized consultant
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant unaware of fraud, but document still considered misleading
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Lack of knowledge of fraudulent document

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the submission of a fraudulent IELTS test result constituted material misrepresentation under section 40(1)(a) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Judicial review under section 72(1) of the IRPA
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Use of forged document affecting immigration decision-making
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Document was intentionally fraudulent and influenced application outcome
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to verify authenticity of submitted document
Crimes.Decision_Outcome: Inadmissibility confirmed regardless of applicant knowledge
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Validity of inadmissibility determination based on third-party fraud
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Submission of fraudulent IELTS result by unauthorized consultant
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant did not review application before submission
